GK21ttrkhy1u:9: tatra kadācid vānarayūtho giriśikharād avatīrya svecchayā
GK21ttrkhy1u:11: ekas tu tatrāsannavināśaś cāpalād upaviśya stambhe yantracāram
GK21ttrkhy1u:15: sthānāc calite kīle yad vṛttam ! tad anākhyeyam ! evam eva bhavatā
GK21ttrkhy1u:18: asti kaścid gomāyur āhāravicchedāt kṣutkṣāmakaṇṭha itaś ca
GK21ttrkhy1u:22: śabdaḥ ! kva vā kīdṛśo vaiṣa śabda iti ! cintayatā dṛṣṭā
GK21ttrkhy1u:25: kim ayaṃ śabdo 'syās svābhāvikaḥ ! uta paraprerita iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:26: atha sā yadā vāyupreritair vṛkṣāgrais spṛśyate ! tadā śabdaṃ karoti !
GK21ttrkhy1u:28: sa tu tasyās sārāsāratāṃ jñātuṃ saṃnikarṣam upaśliṣṭaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:29: svayaṃ ca kautukād ubhayor mukhayor atāḍayat ! acintayac ca|
GK21ttrkhy1u:32: paruṣatvāc ca carmaṇaḥ kathamapi na daṃṣṭrābhaṅgam avāptavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:35: ity adhyavasya bheryā mukhaṃ vidāryāntaḥ praviṣṭaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:40: asti kasmiṃścit pradeśe parivrāḍ devaśarmā nāma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:43: sa ca na kasyacid api viśvāsaṃ yāti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:44: atha kadācid āṣāḍhabhūtir nāma paravittāpahṛt katham iyam
GK21ttrkhy1u:47: atha kadācid asau parivrājakas tīrthayātrāprasaṅge tena
GK21ttrkhy1u:49: tatra ca kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe nadītīre mātrāntika
GK21ttrkhy1u:58: kṛtaśaucaś cāgatas tam uddeśam āṣāḍhabhūmim api
GK21ttrkhy1u:69: praviśann ekāntavāsinaṃ tantravāyam apaśyat ! āvāsakaṃ ca
GK21ttrkhy1u:73: yāvad ahaṃ nagaraṃ gatvā suhṛtsameto madhupānaṃ krtvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:74: āgacchāmi ! tāvad apramattayā gṛhe tvayā bhāvyam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:76: atha tasya bhāryā puṃścalī dūtikāsañcoditā śarīrasaṃskāraṃ kṛtvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:80: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā pratyutpannamatiḥ kauśalād ākalpam apanīya
GK21ttrkhy1u:83: kaulikas tu gṛhaṃ praviśya nidrāvaśam agamat |
GK21ttrkhy1u:85: puṃścali ! tvadgatam apacāraṃ suhṛdo me varṇayanti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:88: asāv api nirmaryādā prativacanaṃ dātum ārabdhā |
GK21ttrkhy1u:89: punar api cāsau pratibuddhas tāṃ madhyastūṇāyāṃ rajjvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:94: asāv api pratibuddhas tathaiva tām ākroṣṭum ārabdhaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:97: tantravāyas tu śāṭhyād iyaṃ na kiñcin mamottaraṃ prayacchati
GK21ttrkhy1u:98: ity utthāya tasyās tīkṣṇaśastreṇa nāsikāṃ chittvābravīt |
GK21ttrkhy1u:102: āgatā ca sā tantravāyī dūtikām apṛcchat |
GK21ttrkhy1u:106: dūtikā tu kṛtanigrahā nāsikāṃ darśayantī sāmarṣam āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:112: kaulikas tu yathāpūrvam eva pratibuddhas tām ākrośat |
GK21ttrkhy1u:113: asāv api duṣṭā bahu dhṛṣṭaram āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:117: yathāhaṃ kaumāraṃ bhartāraṃ muktvā nānyaṃ parapuruṣaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:118: manasāpi vedmi ! tathā mamānena satyenāvyaṅgyaṃ mukham astv
GK21ttrkhy1u:122: hṛṣṭamanā bandhavād avamucya pīḍitaṃ ca pariṣvajya śayyām
GK21ttrkhy1u:124: parivrājakas tv ādita evārabhya yathāvṛttam artham abhijñātavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:127: atha tasyā bhartā nāpito rājakulāt pratyūṣasy āgatya tāṃ bhāryām āha
GK21ttrkhy1u:131: sā ca duṣṭābhyantarasthaiva kṣuram eva prāhiṇot |
GK21ttrkhy1u:133: nāpitas tam eva tasyāḥ kṣuraṃ pratīpaṃ prāhiṇot |
GK21ttrkhy1u:134: athāsāv ārtaravam ucchaiḥ kṛtvā pāṇinā nāsāpuṭaṃ pramṛjya
GK21ttrkhy1u:139: virūpāṃ kīlapārṣṇilaguḍair atīva hataṃ paścād bāhubandhaś
GK21ttrkhy1u:140: ca tayā saha dharmasthānam upanīto nāpitaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:141: pṛcchyamānaś cādhikṛtaiḥ kim idaṃ mahad viśasanaṃ svadāreṣu
GK21ttrkhy1u:142: tvayā kṛtam iti yadā bahuśa ucyamāno nottaraṃ prayacchati ! tadā
GK21ttrkhy1u:144: niṣpāpaṃ ca parivrāṭ cchūlasthānaṃ nīyamānaṃ nāpitaṃ dṛṣṭvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:153: asti kasmiṃścit pradeśe vṛkṣaḥ ! tasmiṃś ca vāyasau dampatī
GK21ttrkhy1u:159: bhadra ! kim evaṃ gate prāptakālaṃ bhavān manyate |
GK21ttrkhy1u:168: asti ! kaścid bako vṛddhabhāvāt sukhopāyāṃ vṛttim
GK21ttrkhy1u:172: māma ! kim adyāhārakṛtyaṃ nānuṣṭhīyate yathā pureti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:176: mayā yuṣmān āsādya pūrvaṃ prāṇarakṣā kṛtā |
GK21ttrkhy1u:186: tān āsādya punar āgamiṣyāma iti kathayām āsuḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:194: kintv asmād dhradād anyaṃ jalāśayaṃ yuṣmān saṅkrāmayiṣyāmi
GK21ttrkhy1u:196: tatas tair viśvāsam upagatais tāta ! bhrātar ! mātula ! mātula ! māṃ naya
GK21ttrkhy1u:198: asāv api duṣṭamatiḥ krameṇa nītvā kauśalād ajasraṃ tān bhakṣayan
GK21ttrkhy1u:200: kulīrakas tu mṛtyubhayodvigno muhur muhus taṃ prārthitavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:201: māma ! mām api tāvad arhasi mṛtyumukhāt paritrātum iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:209: nihatā anena durātmanā prajñāpūrvakaṃ te mīnāḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:212: [ abhiyukto yadā paśyen na kāñcid gatim ātmanaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:213: yudhyamānas tadā prājño mriyeta ripuṇā saha ||61|| ]
GK21ttrkhy1u:237: tac cāvasthāpyānyayā saha kathāṃ kartum ārabdhā |
GK21ttrkhy1u:238: vāyasas tu tad gṛhītvā viyatā śanair ātmānaṃ darśayan svam ālayaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:241: gatvā vṛkṣo 'valokitaḥ ! yāvat tena tat svanīḍe sthāpitam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:245: tat kṛtvā suvarṇasūtram ādāya gata iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:247: asti ! kasmiṃścid vanāntare mahān siṃhaḥ prativasati sma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:249: atha te mṛgās sarvae evābhimukhāḥ praṇatacittā
GK21ttrkhy1u:252: bho mṛgarāja kim anena paralokaviruddhena svāmino nṛśaṃsena
GK21ttrkhy1u:254: vayaṃ tāvad vinaṣṭā eva ! tavāpy āhārasyābhāvaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:257: vayaṃ tu svāmina ekaikaṃ vanacaraṃ vāreṇa svajātisamutthaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:260: sa tu sarvamṛgājñāpito ruṣitamanāś cintayām āsa |
GK21ttrkhy1u:279: katham anyo 'tra madbhujaparirakṣite vane siṃha iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:287: asāv api śaśo 'ntarlīnam avahasya bṛhaspatyuśanasor nītiśāstraṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:291: kumārgāpannacitto 'yam asau sapatna iti matvā sahasaiva tasya
GK21ttrkhy1u:294: asti kasyacid rājñas sarvaguṇopetam ananyasadṛśaṃ śayanam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:295: tasmin pracchadapaṭaikadeśe mandavisarpiṇī nāma yūkā prativasati sma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:296: atha tasmiṃṣ ṭiṇṭibho nāma matkuṇo vāyunā preritas sannipatitaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:297: sa tu tac chayanam atisūkṣmottaracchadam ubhayopadhānaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:298: jāhnavīpulinavipulaṃ paramamṛdu surabhi ca dṛṣṭvā paraṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:300: tatsparśākṛṣṭamanā itaś cetaḥ paribhraman katham api tayā
GK21ttrkhy1u:306: ārye ! mayā tāvad ihānekaprakārāṇi māṃsāny āsvāditāni
GK21ttrkhy1u:308: tāni tu rūkṣāṇi picchilāny atuṣṭikarāṇy amanojñāni |
GK21ttrkhy1u:309: yaḥ punar asya śayanasyādhiṣṭhātā ! tasya manoramam amṛtopamam
GK21ttrkhy1u:316: tac ca surabhi puṣṭikaraṃ cecchāmy ahaṃ tvatprasādād
GK21ttrkhy1u:322: sā tu dākṣiṇyāt tathā nāmeti pratipannā |
GK21ttrkhy1u:323: kintu naivākāle na cātimṛdubhāge tvayāsya prahartavyam iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:332: asāv api parthiva ulmukadagdha iva saṃlīnakukṣipradeśas
GK21ttrkhy1u:335: atha matkuṇaś cakitatvād rājavacanaṃ śrutvā śayanād avatīrya
GK21ttrkhy1u:337: śayyāpālair api svāmyādeśāt sunipuṇam anviṣadbhir vastraṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:338: parivartayadbhir antarlīnā mandavisarpiṇī samāsāditā vyāpāditā ca |
GK21ttrkhy1u:342: sa kadācid āhāram anveṣamāṇaḥ kṣapām āsādya kṣutkṣāmagalas
GK21ttrkhy1u:352: kroṣṭukagaṇāḥ ko 'yam iti bhayataraladṛśas sarvā diśaḥ
GK21ttrkhy1u:355: nūnam imāṃ svarūpavikṛtiṃ dṛṣṭvaite palāyantae iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:364: āpūryamāṇakukṣiḥ kakṣam iva taṃ jambukapūgaṃ bahiḥ kṛtvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:366: ekadā tv asau vividhapiśitanāśitakṣud dikṣu sthitānāṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:367: kroṣṭukānāṃ krośatāṃ ninādaṃ śrutvā tvaritataram uccair ninanāda
GK21ttrkhy1u:369: atas te siṃhādayas trapayā bhūbhāgadṛṣṭibhājaḥ kaṣṭam aho !
GK21ttrkhy1u:370: vañcitās smaḥ ! kroṣṭāyam ity avadhārya ruṣā taṃ paruṣagiraṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:372: [1,9 Kamel, Löwe, Panther, Krähe und Schakal]
GK21ttrkhy1u:373: asti ! kasmiṃścid vanoddeśe madotkaṭo nāma siṃhaḥ prativasati sma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:375: atha tair bhramadbhir dṛṣṭas sārthavāhaparibhraṣṭa uṣṭraḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:378: idam apūrvaṃ sattvam iha vane pṛcchyatām |
GK21ttrkhy1u:383: tenāpi yathāvṛttam ātmano viyogas sārthavāhāt samākhyātaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:387: pañcaṣaḍdivasātikrānte ca kāle sarvae eva tae āhāravaikalyād
GK21ttrkhy1u:390: aham anayā rujā na kṣamaḥ pūrvavad āhāraṃ bhavatām utpādayitum |
GK21ttrkhy1u:391: te yūyam ātmārthe 'pi tāvad abhyudgamaṃ kuruta |
GK21ttrkhy1u:395: sādhv anujīvivṛttaṃ madupari bhaktiś ca bhavatām |
GK21ttrkhy1u:399: yadā ca na kiñcid ūcuḥ ! tadā tenābhihitāḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:404: evam uktvā te 'py utthāya saha krathanakena vanāntaraṃ praviṣṭāḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:407: vināśitā vayam anena svāminā svādhīne 'py arthe |
GK21ttrkhy1u:420: tiṣṭhata yūyaṃ yāvad aham evaitad arthaṃ sampratipādayiṣyāmi |
GK21ttrkhy1u:425: yasya cakṣur balaṃ vā syāt ! so 'nviṣyatu |
GK21ttrkhy1u:426: vayaṃ tu sarvae evāhāravaikalyād andhāḥ parikṣīṇaśaktayaś
GK21ttrkhy1u:445: etad anyad api pradhānaṃ maharṣivacanam ! yathā śreyasām arthe
GK21ttrkhy1u:448: [ tyajed ekaṃ kulasyārthe grāmasyārthe kulaṃ tyajet |
GK21ttrkhy1u:456: ayaṃ tāvad etadavasthaṃ svāminam asmāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā svayam
GK21ttrkhy1u:458: evam abhihitavati vāyase siṃho matibhramam ivārpito na kiñcid apy
GK21ttrkhy1u:460: asāv api punas tatsakāśaṃ gatvā kṛtakavacanaiḥ pratyekaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:462: siṃhāntikaṃ gatair yuṣmābhir evaṃ vaktavyam iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:463: tataḥ kṛtasaṃvidas saha krathanakena siṃhasakāśaṃ gatāḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:475: ābhyāṃ mama viśiṣṭataraṃ śarīram idam upayujyatām iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:480: tad aham apy evam eva bravīmi |
GK21ttrkhy1u:484: evam abhivadann eva dvīpigomāyubhyāṃ vidāritobhayakukṣis sadyaḥ
GK21ttrkhy1u:498: bhadre ! na śakto mahodadhir mayā sārdham īdṛśaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:504: [ duḥkham ātmā paricchettum evaṃ yogyo na veti vā |
GK21ttrkhy1u:505: evaṃvid yasya vijñānaṃ saphalās tasya buddhayaḥ ||126|| ]
GK21ttrkhy1u:508: sa kūrma iva durbuddhiḥ kāṣṭhād bhraṣṭo vinaśyati ||127|| ]
GK21ttrkhy1u:513: asti ! kasmiṃścit sarasi kambugrīvo nāma kacchapaḥ prativasati sma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:519: kiṃ punaś ciroṣitaṃ priyamitraṃ kambugrīvam āmantrayāvahe |
GK21ttrkhy1u:522: yadi tu sneho 'sti ! tato mām apy asmān mṛtyumukhāt trātum arhathaḥ
GK21ttrkhy1u:524: yatkāraṇam ! yuvayos tāvad āhāravaikalyaṃ kevalam asmin
GK21ttrkhy1u:525: svalpodake sarasi ! mamātra tu maraṇam eva |
GK21ttrkhy1u:532: tvayā punaś cāpalān na kiñcid vaktavyam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:533: imāṃ tu yaṣṭiṃ madhye daśanair āpīḍaya |
GK21ttrkhy1u:534: evam anayaivoddhṛtya ṣaṣṭimātrāṇi yojanāni mahat saro
GK21ttrkhy1u:538: nīyamānaṃ dṛṣṭvā ! kim idaṃ śakaṭacakrapramāṇaṃ viyatā
GK21ttrkhy1u:540: tac ca śrutvāsannavināśaḥ kacchapo yaṣṭiṃ tyaktvābhihitavān
GK21ttrkhy1u:543: cāpalād eṣa lokaḥ pralapati ! iti bruvan vacanasamakālam evāśrayāt
GK21ttrkhy1u:544: paribhraṣṭo bhūmau nipatitaḥ ! māṃsārthinā ca lokena
GK21ttrkhy1u:545: pātasamakālam eva tīkṣṇaśastraiḥ khaṇḍaśo vibhakta iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:547: asti ! kasmiṃścin mahāhrade mahākāyās trayo matsyāḥ prativasanti
GK21ttrkhy1u:556: tad ahaṃ pratyutpannamatiṃ yadbhaviṣyaṃ ca gṛhītvānyam
GK21ttrkhy1u:561: yadbhaviṣyas tv āsannavināśas tadvacanam anādṛtya nirārambha eva
GK21ttrkhy1u:565: apakṛṣṭe ca jāle tasmin hrade nāpy ekataro 'vaśiṣṭaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:566: evaṃ gate pratyutpannamatir mṛtarūpaṃ kṛtvātmānaṃ jalasya
GK21ttrkhy1u:568: tair api svayam eva mṛto mahāmatsya iti kṛtvā parisrotasi sthāpitaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:574: atha kadācit prasūtāyāṃ ṭīṭibhyāṃ tadbhartṛjijñāsayā samudreṇa
GK21ttrkhy1u:575: apahṛtās te 'ṇḍakāḥ ! paśyāmi tāvat ! ayaṃ kim ārambhatae iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:576: atha ṭīṭibhī śūnyam apatyasthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā paramāvignahṛdayā
GK21ttrkhy1u:580: mamāpi tāvat ! bhadre ! dṛśyatāṃ sāmarthyam iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:581: tatas tena pakṣisamājaṃ kṛtvā niveditaṃ tadapatyaharaṇajaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:586: sarvae eva vayam ākrandena garutmantam udvejayāmaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:589: asāv api devāsuraraṇanimittam āhūto viṣṇunā garuḍas tat
GK21ttrkhy1u:594: yuktaṃ tvayā nāthena satā samudrāpasadān mamāyaṃ paribhava iti
GK21ttrkhy1u:596: jñātvā ca devaḥ parihasya samudrasyedam uvāca |
GK21ttrkhy1u:602: iti matvā praṇamya devaṃ samarpitavān iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:607: kṣutkṣāmatanuḥ kṣudhā parigatān tān sacivān āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:608: kiñcid anviṣyatāṃ vane sattvajātam ! yenāham etadavastho 'pi
GK21ttrkhy1u:610: atha tadājñāsamakālam eva te 'raṇye paryaṭanto yadā na kiñcid
GK21ttrkhy1u:611: āseduḥ ! tadāsau jambukas taṃ śaṅkukarṇanāmānaṃ karabhaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:616: tad ahaṃ kiñcid bhavataḥ prārthaye ! yadi pratīcchasīti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:623: ahaṃ te dviguṇaṃ śarīraṃ siṃhasakāśād dāpayiṣye |
GK21ttrkhy1u:624: tvayāpy evaṃ vayam ātmā ca saṃvardhitās syur iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:626: evam abhidhāya siṃhasakāśaṃ gatvā tam āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:633: atha pratipanne śaṅkukarṇaḥ papāta bhūmau ! khaṇḍaśaś ca kṛtaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:634: tataś caturakas taṃ siṃhaṃ rudhiraraktasarvagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:636: gacchatu svāmī snānam ācaritum ! yāvad ahaṃ kravyamukhasahitas
GK21ttrkhy1u:638: gate ca tasmiṃś caturakas taṃ kravyamukham āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:639: bhakṣaya tāvad ataḥ piśitam ! yāvad asau snātuṃ gataḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:645: tvayā punar mama mukham evāvalokitavyam iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:646: evam ukte tābhyāṃ kravyam atibahu bhakṣitam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:647: atrāntare siṃhas samprāpto yāvat paśyati sakalaṃ jaṭharapiśitam
GK21ttrkhy1u:650: evaṃ vadati siṃhe kravyamukho mukhaṃ caturakasyāvalokitavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:660: etasmiṃś cāntare kathamapi ca tatsamīpam atha kaścit sārthavāho
GK21ttrkhy1u:662: tasya ca sārthāgresaraṃ kaṭāhena galabaddhena karabham
GK21ttrkhy1u:663: āgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtakaviṣādo jambukas taṃ siṃham āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:666: yāvad adyāpi piśitaṃ nopabhujyate ! tāvad bṛhatprastham ādāya
GK21ttrkhy1u:669: gacchatu svāmī digantaram anyat ! yāvad aham enaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:676: khadyotaṃ dṛṣṭvāgnir ayam ity āhāryaiś śuṣkatṛṇaparṇair
GK21ttrkhy1u:679: tatraikaś śākhāmṛgas tadgatamanā muhurmuhus tam eva
GK21ttrkhy1u:685: athāsāv adhamat tasya tad vacanam avamanyaiva |
GK21ttrkhy1u:686: punaś ca tenāsakṛd vāryamāṇo naiva śāmyati |
GK21ttrkhy1u:687: kiṃ bahunā ! tāvat tena karṇābhāśam āgatyāgatya prabalam
GK21ttrkhy1u:688: udvejitaḥ ! yāvat tena sahasā gṛhītvā śilāyām āvidhya vigataprāṇaḥ kṛto
GK21ttrkhy1u:691: asti ! kasmiṃścid adhiṣṭhāne vaṇiksutau suhṛdau staḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:694: atha tatra dharmabuddhir nāmaikas sārthavāhasuto yas tena kasyacit
GK21ttrkhy1u:697: sa duṣṭabuddhinā saha sampradhārya kṛtārthāv āvāṃ svadeśaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:703: atha duṣṭabuddhir antaḥkaṭhinahṛdayas svārthasiddhaye tam āha |
GK21ttrkhy1u:704: bhadra ! vittaśeṣo yāvad āvayos sāmānyaḥ ! tāvad avicchinnas
GK21ttrkhy1u:706: kintv ekam ekaṃ śataṃ gṛhītvā praviśāvaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:709: tathā cānuṣṭhite śeṣaṃ kutracit suguptaṃ kṛtvā praviṣṭau |
GK21ttrkhy1u:711: bhāgyacchidratayā ca kṣīṇapratyaṃśaḥ punar api ca nidhito
GK21ttrkhy1u:715: yadi punaś śatavibhāgena vibhajāvaḥ ! tat kiṃ mayā kṛtaṃ bhavati |
GK21ttrkhy1u:717: evaṃ matvaikākī bhūtvā tām arthamātrām apanīya pradeśaṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:720: pratipanne ca dharmabuddhinā saha gatvā tam evoddeśaṃ khātakarma
GK21ttrkhy1u:722: khanyamāne ca yadā na dṛśyate ! tadā prathamataraṃ dhṛṣṭatayā
GK21ttrkhy1u:737: yasyaiva vṛkṣasyādhastāt sthāpitaṃ dravyam ! tenaiva vibhāvayāmi
GK21ttrkhy1u:739: atha te vismayam upagatāḥ ! kathaṃ vanaspatir mantrayiṣyatīti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:744: ahaṃ tu tvām adya rātrau vṛkṣavivare 'smin sthāpayāmi |
GK21ttrkhy1u:750: [ upāyaṃ cintayet prājño hy apāyam api cintayet |
GK21ttrkhy1u:756: asti ! kasmiṃścid arjunavṛkṣe bakadampatī prativasatas sma |
GK21ttrkhy1u:757: tatra ca vṛkṣavivarānusārī mahākāyo 'hir asañjātakriyāṇy eva
GK21ttrkhy1u:759: tena ca nirvedena naṣṭasañjñāv āhārakriyām utsṛjya
GK21ttrkhy1u:762: māma ! kim adyāpy āhāro anuṣṭhīyatae iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:767: sa tu tasmai yathāvṛttam apatyabhakṣaṇam ākhyātavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:779: upāyaṃ cintayet prājño hy apāyam api cintayet |
GK21ttrkhy1u:780: iti bruvann api tenāsau nītvā sthāpito vṛkṣavivare |
GK21ttrkhy1u:785: tac ca śrutvā dharmabuddiś cintayām āsa |
GK21ttrkhy1u:791: adyāpy aviplutae eva loke dharmabuddir ahaṃ vijane 'smin vanae
GK21ttrkhy1u:797: punar api viṣayā labhyante ! na tu prāṇāḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:801: kintv asmāt sthānād ekānte 'vasthānaṃ kurudhvam ! yāvad aham
GK21ttrkhy1u:807: pradīpte ca vahnau samantata ujjvalībhūtād vṛkṣavivarāt sphaṭitatanuḥ
GK21ttrkhy1u:808: pluṣṭakeśas srastatvag yadā jāto vaṇik ! tadā bhūmau nipatitaḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:809: tat tu mahad vaikārikaṃ dṛṣṭvā kim idam iti paraṃ vismayam upagatāḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:810: kiñcij jīvitaṃ ca pratyakṣam abhijñāya vaṇikputraṃ papracchuḥ |
GK21ttrkhy1u:811: kim idam īdṛśam agnipatanam adhyavasitaṃ bhavateti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:813: anena duṣputreṇāham avasthām imāṃ prāpita iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:821: so 'nyasmin vaṇikputrake tāṃ nikṣipya deśāntaram arthopārjanāya
GK21ttrkhy1u:823: kṣīṇabhāgyatvāc ca tena bahunāpi kālena na kiñcid āsāditam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:824: pratyāgataś ca tāṃ tulāṃ tasmāt prārthitavān |
GK21ttrkhy1u:830: antarlīnam avahasyābravīt ! avaśyam etad evam ! yatkāraṇam |
GK21ttrkhy1u:831: vṛṣyaṃ svādu mṛdu ca lohaṃ katham ākhavo na bhakṣayiṣyanti ! iti
GK21ttrkhy1u:833: asāv api suparihṛṣṭahṛdayaḥ pādyādipurassarāṃ tasya pūjāṃ
GK21ttrkhy1u:836: tatra snānābhyudyatasya ca tasya svīyaṃ putram ekam
GK21ttrkhy1u:838: asāv api pratyāgacchan dārakam anyasmin mitragṛhe suguptaṃ kṛtvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:840: atha bhojanasamaye sārthavāho dārakam adṛṣṭvā samākulamanāś
GK21ttrkhy1u:846: tac chrutvā paramāvigno nirdayībhūtaś ca taṃ bāhau gṛhītvā
GK21ttrkhy1u:849: anena me dārakaḥ kvāpi gopita iti |
GK21ttrkhy1u:859: yatra tulā lohasahasrasyāsya gehe madīyā mūṣakair bhakṣitā ! tatra
GK21ttrkhy1u:861: tac ca śrutvā pratipāditavantas te prāḍvivākāḥ parasparasya
